title: [Icemule Trace, Exterior]
description: Rising above the pathway which skirts the town are the blades of a windmill, which forms the southwestern corner of the town's wall.  The dark wood of the blades, as they turn to catch the wind, provides a sharp contrast to the light grey stone of the wall.

Rising above the pathway which skirts the town are the blades of a windmill, which forms the southwestern corner of the town's wall.  The dark wood of the blades, as they turn to catch the wind, provides a sharp contrast to the light grey stone of the wall.  A snow-covered path is completely blocked by a large stone barrier.

Rising above the pathway which skirts the town are the blades of a windmill, which forms the southwestern corner of the town's wall.  The dark wood of the blades, as they turn to catch the wind, provides a sharp contrast to the light grey stone of the wall.  Nearby, a snow-covered path leads toward a rustic hall, which looms above an icy courtyard.
